subject: Economy
question_en: What is the Gross Domestic Product (GDP) of India in 2021?
question_hi: 2021 में भारत का ग्रोस दोस्तीय प्रमोजन (GDP) क्या है।
explanation_en: According to the National Accounts Statistics released by the Ministry of Statistics and Programme Implementation, the Gross Domestic Product (GDP) of India in 2021 was Rs. 2,23,80,000 crore. So, answer is D.
In 2021, the GDP (Gross Domestic Product) of India was Rs. 2,23,80,000 crore. Therefore, the answer is D.
